item.title: Viu introduces exclusive Korean content: Song Ji Hyo's Beauty Views
item.description:
Song Ji Hyoâ€™s Beauty Views is a partnership between Viu and the famous Korean actress from the variety show Running Man. Viu, a pan-Asian streaming platform owned by PCCW Media, has made investments in Viu Originals to boost user engagement. Viu Originals features Korean, Chinese, Indian, and Southeast Asian content for viewers across Asia. Given the significant popularity of Korean content in the region, Viu Originals aims to increase user engagement by offering captivating and locally relevant original programs...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/viu-introduces-exclusive-korean-content-song-ji-hyo-s-beauty-views/
